name: Pinoy Hatdog
text: Aba aba sir roy, bumili ka na din! Haha. Personally, gusto ko hintayin ang version na may facetime (sans any external hardware).Regarding the slow (and misleading) USB charging, I think that happens when you try to charge with a mobile device (e.g. a laptop). By standard, USB connectors on desktops provide a more "stable" power output as compared to mobile devices due to their (more often) lack of a "fixed" power source.HTH 🙂
